name: Keybored Operator
description:
Get hired by Big Budget Company as a Keyboard Operator. Job listing seems ok, but somethings felt a bit fishy. 

Can you juggle between multiple keyboards, and still get the job done in a timely matter?

This is the first time I try to write a "storyline", let me know if it's good or bad.

Submission for Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM

Here's the story, I thought the game jam is a 48 hours jam, so I finished and submitted a game in the first 2 days. I then realized that I have 7 more days, so I started this game project.

Here's my  first entry: https://kyboon.itch.io/nodebound
